markup_reference.title: Render a table containing all cards that are a part of the favorite named 'Release One'. Quotes may be omitted if the favorite name does not contain any spaces.
markup_reference.note: Macro markup is space sensitive and we advise you to stick to the indentation scheme specified in the example. If you add project as a parameter this needs to be added to a new line as shown in the markup below.

row.label: view
row.col: A previously saved favorite, the contents of which will be shown in the table.
One, and only one of query or view is required.
